name: Miso-Glazed Broiled Halibut
author: Allyson
summary: This is also good with cod, or any mild white fish. Serve with lime wedges.
ingredients: 1 ½ pounds halibut fillets, bones removed
directions: Set oven rack about 4 inches from the heat source and preheat the oven's broiler
Line a baking sheet with aluminum foil and brush with cooking spray
Whisk miso, rice wine, and mirin together in a small bowl until smooth
Place halibut on the baking sheet and cover with 1/2 the miso mixture
Broil in the preheated oven until golden, 4 to 5 minutes
Turn and brush with remaining miso mixture
Continue broiling until second side is golden, 3 to 4 minutes more
